targets.query: SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 AS "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 AS "out" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "net_bytes_recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "tag", "tag"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "net_bytes_recv" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "tag", "tag"

SELECT mean(tcp_close) AS CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) AS CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) AS CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) AS ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) AS FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) AS FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) AS LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) AS SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) AS SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) AS TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("udp_indatagrams"), 1s) AS "in datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("udp_outdatagrams"), 1s) AS "out datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "interface" != 'all'
list.label: interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "interface" != 'all'
